name: gigapaste
tagline: A pastebin service for sharing code and text with expiration controls
description: GigaPaste is a self-hosted pastebin application that supports syntax highlighting, expiration controls, and public or private snippets. Ideal for sharing logs, code, or notes within development or teaching environments.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Create public or private snippets with optional password protection for sensitive content

features.title: Code Sharing
features.description: Share logs, code, and text snippets quickly within development or teaching environments

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep shared content on your own infrastructure without third-party dependencies

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Facilitate code review and debugging by sharing snippets internally
